notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher from colophon; date of publication from Wing.
This item appears at reel 360:1 as Wing K195 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), attributed to George Keith, and at reel 1719:9, attributed to William Haworth.
